name: Avoid undocumented Implementation files
description: This rule searches for C/C++ implementation files that do not contain any comment.
output:
Associated to each C/C++ implementation file with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- File name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code.
remediation: Insert documentation into C/C++ source files to describes the function expectation and the technical aspect of the code.
